# brand

**Instance Property**

The name of the prescribed brand, based on the contact lens fitting.

## Declaration

```swift
var brand: String { get }
```

## Accessing the contacts prescription data

- **leftEye**: The lens specification for the left eye.
- **rightEye**: The lens specification for the right eye.

items.description: The lens specification for the left eye.
items.name: leftEye

items.description: The lens specification for the right eye.
items.name: rightEye

title: brand
